title: My pixel 3 randomly during the day would drop connection and reboot until it gets connection
content:
My pixel 3 during the day would drop all connection (wifi, lte, no sim card detected) and keeps on rebooting until it can detect sim card. It happens randomly, maximum up time 15 hours.
I have put in a new sim, start in safe mode, factory reset. It even happened during the factory reset once.
